* @param parser in-charge to convert user input to valid program input command

* Represents list tasks action command. A ListTasks object corresponds to
* the action to list all task in the program

sentence.append("You have total ").append(getParser().getTaskManager().size()).append(" duke.tasks in the list.");

* Represents unmark action command. A Unmark object corresponds to

* An abstract exception class which is super class for all check exception for duke program
* @param errorMessage the error message for exception

* A DukeException to check if command is valid

* A DukeException to check if index for mark or unmark action is valid

* A DukeException to check the error during loading of local file
* @param file         the file that cause the error
super("☹ OOPS!!! Fail to load file: " + file + "\n" + errorMessage);
* A DukeException to check the error during save the tasks to local file

super("☹ OOPS!!! Fail to save file: " + file + "\n" + errorMessage);
